org.propelgraph

Class LocatableGraphFactoryFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.propelgraph.LocatableGraphFactoryFactoryImpl

  • public class LocatableGraphFactoryFactoryImpl
extends Object
    This class implements most of the glue needed to implement the LocatableGraphFactory support.
    Author:
    ccjason (11/9/2014)

    • Method Detail

      • parseForURLParameter

        public static final String parseForURLParameter(String strP,
                          String urlPath,
                          String defaultval)
        the value of the specified optional parameter of the specified url. Unlike the other method with this name, this one lets the caller pass in a default value to be returned if the parameter was not found.
        Parameters:
        strP -
        urlPath -
        defaultval -
        Returns:
        String

      • parseForURLParameter

        public static final String parseForURLParameter(String paramprefix,
                          String urlstring)
        returns the value for the specified parameter encoded in the specified url string. This helper method is useful to implementations of LocatableGraphFactory.
        Parameters:
        paramprefix - the parameter string preceding the value of interest. For example, if one wants the "hostname" parameter of a url, the value passed here should be "&hostname=";
        urlstring -
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - thrown if the parameter was not found.

      • openGraph

        public static Graph openGraph(String graphurl,
              String faction,
              String fmode)
                       throws InstantiationException,
                              IllegalAccessException,
                              ClassNotFoundException,
                              AlreadyExistsException,
                              NotFoundException,
                              UnsupportedFActionException
        Returns a hydrated graph given the graph url specified. This helper method exists because we want to support graph urls on some graph implementations that have not yet begun to support the LocatableGraph interface. See the LocatableGraphFactory.open(String,String,String) method for information about the semantics of this method.
        Parameters:
        graphurl -
        faction -
        fmode -
        Returns:
        Graph
        Throws:
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
        ClassNotFoundException
        AlreadyExistsException
        NotFoundException
        UnsupportedFActionException

      • getGraphURL

        public static String getGraphURL(Graph graph)
        the url string that can be used to later rehyrate this graph. This is a helper method that attempts to handle even a few Graph implementations that don't yet support the LocatableGraph interface. See the LocatableGraphFactory.open(String,String,String) method for information about the semantics of this method.
        Parameters:
        graph -
        Returns:
        String
